radiographic_examinations.findings: extensive periventricular gray-matter heterotopia, a large cisterna magna, and micrognathia

dilatation of the ascending aorta, large patent ductus arteriosus, enlarged pulmonary-artery trunk, enlarged left and right main pulmonary arteries, scattered bandlike and ground-glass opacities, and areas of hyperaeration in both lungs
